plot: Many voices, one truth. The purpose of life is examined through the answers of twenty-one people chosen at random--but is anything truly random?
title: Purpose
plot_es: Many voices, one truth. The purpose of life is examined through the answers of twenty-one people chosen at random--but is anything truly random?
plot_en: Many voices, one truth. The purpose of life is examined through the answers of twenty-one people chosen at random--but is anything truly random?
